import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homework043', templateUrl: './homework043.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homework043.component.css'], }) export class Homework043Component { showPassword = false; secretPassword = 'tuna'; testMessage = ''; displayDetails() { this.showPassword ? (this.showPassword = false) : (this.showPassword = true); } eventHandler(event: Event) { this.testMessage = (event.target).value; console.log(this.testMessage); } }
